messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] The air-pig
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/21/04 7:16:54 AM, mina@mabb.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/21/04 7:16:54 AM, mina@... writes:

<< That's what I thought you were talking about. I've seen one with The One
Ring in it. Very cool! >>

Oh! yeah, rings look pretty in it. I can see how someone would've thought
it more suited to a ring of power than a pink pig. <g>

We've experimented with lots of little things, and some are too hard and
might scratch the surface, but this is SO fun that I told the kids not to worry.
If this one gets too messed up we can get another someday. If the thing is
any bigger than about 1" square, it distorts. And that's fun to experiment
with too, with HOW it distorts.

Sandra

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] The air-pig
messages.msgSnippet: That s really cool!  We ve always enjoyed the holograms at our Science Centre.  Thanks for passing it along.  I ve put it on my growing list of cool things to
messages.messageBody:
That's really cool! We've always enjoyed the holograms at our Science
Centre. Thanks for passing it along. I've put it on my growing list of
cool things to get for Christmas. :-)

Pam L
www.livingjoyfully.ca
